original: Östlund, Bo Ernst Gustav (Gösta) Edward, civilingenjör, Limmared, f. 26/ 7/00 i Sthlm av fabr. Edward o. Lisen Östlund. G. m. Karin Lindgren. Barn: Kajsa f. 29, Per Johan 31, Lars 32, Björn 315, Ove 36, Bo 40, Bertil 43. — Stud:ex. 21, avg:ex. fr. KTH 26. Disp. v. Skrufs Nya Glasbruks A-B i Skruv 27-30, förv. v. Orrefors Bruks A-B, Sandviks Glasbruk i Hovmantorp 30-35, disp :assist. h. A-B Fredr. Brusewitz i Limmared 35-37, disp. där 37-47. Verkst. dir. i Limmareds Bruk fr. 47.
translated: Östlund, Bo Ernst Gustav (Gösta) Edward, civil engineer, Limmared, born on July 26, 1900 in Stockholm, to factory worker Edward and Lisen Östlund. Married to Karin Lindgren. Children: Kajsa born in 1929, Per Johan in 1931, Lars in 1932, Björn in 1935, Ove in 1936, Bo in 1940, Bertil in 1943. Completed secondary school in 1921, graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1926. Employed at Skrufs Nya Glasbruks A-B in Skruv from 1927 to 1930, then transferred to Orrefors Bruks A-B and Sandviks Glasbruk in Hovmantorp from 1930 to 1935. Worked as a dispatch assistant at A-B Fredr. Brusewitz in Limmared from 1935 to 1937, and as a dispatcher there from 1937 to 1947. Became the managing director of Limmareds Bruk in 1947.

education.description: Graduated from the Royal Institute of Technology (KTH) in 1926
